descriptions.name: Actions
descriptions.text: Look down to view controller details

descriptions.name: Selecting
descriptions.text: Reach out your arm to hover items, and select using 'A'

descriptions.name: Reposition
descriptions.text: Reposition the menu from the lower right corner

descriptions.name: Help
descriptions.text: Toggle help ON/OFF in the lower left corner

descriptions.name: Filters
descriptions.text: Time, Locations and Tags present different kinds of filters

descriptions.name: KeyBoard
descriptions.text: Type in whole or partial words and click search

descriptions.name: Tag Selection
descriptions.text: Click 'Trigger' to drag horisontally and vertically

descriptions.name: Projecting
descriptions.text: Project a word by choosing 1 axis or more

descriptions.name: Visualisation
descriptions.text: Select a contrainer to view the images inside

descriptions.name: Begin ViRMA
descriptions.text: Finish tutorial and open menu by pressing 'B'
